manpage.method: EzWCharBuf_Box(void *buf, const UINT size, const UINT used)

description.para: Creates a EzWCharBuf object using buffer data and specifies its size and used size respectively.

param_note.para: The size of the buffer, the unit is sizeof(wchar_t).

remarks.para: This constructor is recommended to instantiate EzWCharBuf object when the data to be stored is already allocated but not initialized.
NOTE:- User must release the memory which is pointed by buf.
